value.title: StarCraft 2: ULTIMATE Slow Push! (Polt vs Bly)
value.excerpt: Professional match of StarCraft 2 between Polt and Bly. Polt was one of the most popular progamers in the early days of StarCraft 2. He has won many tournaments throughout his career and recently decided to return to professional gaming. Polt in this Zerg versus Terran decides to go for the slowest of
